title: Save with 30th Anniversary PlayStation Store deals, live Dec 2
description: Celebrate three decades of play with PlayStation Store’s 30th Anniversary Sale starting December 2! Race for first place in Gran Turismo 7, endure and survive in The Last of Us Part II, and join everybody’s favorite marsupial in Crash Bandicoot N. Sane Trilogy. These must-play games join many more, as well as add-ons, in this […]
byline: Hiromi Wakai VP of Product Management, Sony Interactive Entertainment
excerpt: Featuring deals on Gran Turismo 7, The Last of Part I, Crash Bandicoot N. Sane Trilogy, and more through Dec 20.
text: Celebrate three decades of play with PlayStation Store’s 30th Anniversary Sale starting December 2! Race for first place in Gran Turismo 7, endure and survive in The Last of Us Part II, and join everybody’s favorite marsupial in Crash Bandicoot N. Sane Trilogy. These must-play games join many more, as well as add-ons, in this huge sale*. We can’t fit every offering in the PlayStation 30th Anniversary Sale here, so browse a selection of titles below, then head to PlayStation Store starting December 2 to find out your regional discount. 30th Anniversary promotions direct from PlayStation The PlayStation 30th Anniversary promotion extends to hardware and peripherals discounts direct from PlayStation! Be sure to check direct.playstation.com (available in select markets) as offers and promotion dates may vary by region**. #BLUD A Hat in Time A Little to the Left A Plague Tale Bundle A Way Out ABZÛ For more details, please check your dedicated Deals page on PlayStation Store.  **PlayStation Store’s 30th Anniversary Sale runs from 00.00am  PDT/BST/JST Monday, December 2, until 23.59pm  PDT/BST/JST on Friday, December 20. Some games will be removed from the promotion early. Check a game’s PlayStation Store page for its end date. Trending Stories
html:
Celebrate three decades of play with PlayStation Store’s 30th Anniversary Sale starting December 2! Race for first place in Gran Turismo 7, endure and survive in The Last of Us Part II, and join everybody’s favorite marsupial in Crash Bandicoot N. Sane Trilogy. These must-play games join many more, as well as add-ons, in this huge sale*.

We can’t fit every offering in the PlayStation 30th Anniversary Sale here, so browse a selection of titles below, then head to PlayStation Store starting December 2 to find out your regional discount.

30th Anniversary promotions direct from PlayStation

The PlayStation 30th Anniversary promotion extends to hardware and peripherals discounts direct from PlayStation! Be sure to check direct.playstation.com (available in select markets) as offers and promotion dates may vary by region**.
